name: Electric Field from Current Density and Resistivity

variables.name: V
variables.description: Voltage across each element in a closed loop

variables.name: I
variables.description: Current at each branch of a node

variables.name: R_{other}
variables.description: Resistance of the other parallel branch

variables.name: I(t)
variables.description: Current at time t during charging

variables.name: I(t)
variables.description: Current at time t during decay

variables.name: Q
variables.description: Heat energy required for phase change

name: Voltage from Electric Field and Length

variables.name: \hat{r}
variables.description: Unit vector from element to field point

variables.name: r
variables.description: Distance from element to field point

name: Magnetic Field of an Infinite Straight Wire
Magnetic Field at Center of Circular Loop

variables.name: B
variables.description: Magnetic field at center of loop

name: Magnetic Field on Axis of Circular Loop

variables.name: x
variables.description: Axial distance from center of loop

variables.name: n
variables.description: Number of turns per unit length

variables.name: r
variables.description: Radial distance from center of toroid

variables.name: \theta
variables.description: Angle between B and area normal

variables.name: \varepsilon_{induced}
variables.description: Induced EMF (negative sign gives direction opposing change)

variables.name: L
variables.description: Length of conductor moving through field

name: Magnetic Field Inside a Solenoid with Core
Magnetic Field of a Finite Straight Wire

variables.name: \theta_1
variables.description: Angle to one end of wire

variables.name: \theta_2
variables.description: Angle to other end of wire

name: Magnetic Field Inside a Thick Wire (r < R)

variables.name: B
variables.description: Magnetic field at radius r inside wire

name: Magnetic Force on a Moving Charge (Vector Form)
Magnetic Force on a Moving Charge (Scalar)
Magnetic Force on a Current-Carrying Wire (Vector)

variables.name: \vec{L}
variables.description: Length vector of wire (in current direction)

name: Magnetic Force on a Current-Carrying Wire (Scalar)
Force per Unit Length Between Parallel Wires

variables.name: F/L
variables.description: Force per unit length between wires

variables.name: \theta
variables.description: Angle between magnetic moment and B

name: Potential Energy of Magnetic Dipole in Field

variables.name: t
variables.description: Thickness of conductor in B direction

name: Pitch of Helical Motion in Magnetic Field
latex: p = v_{\parallel} T = \frac{2\pi m v_{\parallel}}{|q| B}

variables.name: p
variables.description: Pitch of helix (distance along B per revolution)

name: Magnetic Force on a Differential Current Element
Kinetic Energy of Particle in Cyclotron

variables.name: r
variables.description: Radius of circular path in mass spectrometer

name: Work Done by Magnetic Force on Moving Charge

variables.name: W
variables.description: Work done by magnetic force (always zero — B is perpendicular to v)

variables.name: \theta
variables.description: Angle between B and area normal

name: Electric Field in a Moving Conductor (Motional EMF per Length)

variables.name: \varepsilon/L
variables.description: EMF per unit length (equivalent to E field along conductor)

name: Force on a Magnetic Dipole in Non-Uniform Field

variables.name: dB/dz
variables.description: Gradient of magnetic field along z-axis
